markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Life Boost](/Spells.aspx?ID=1879)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Vitality" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=509" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 385 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Life](/Lessons.aspx?ID=18)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 4 rounds
</row>

</column>

---

Life force from your patron floods into the target, ensuring they can continue doing your patron's will for just a little longer. The target gains [fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 2.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The fast healing increases by 2.
name: Life Boost
